content.prompt: Which of the following best captures a portion of the author’s argument?

choices.label: Women elected officials have not done enough to pass laws promoting women’s rights.
Men and women are legally equal, but women are morally superior to men.
The government has made women subservient by denying them the right to vote.
Women have faced too much suffrage due to the actions of the government.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
